name: f2moviesdl
description: Enhanced F2Movies video downloader with automatic play button detection and advanced stream monitoring

scripts.build: echo 'Building F2MoviesDL...' && tsc && echo 'Build completed successfully!'
scripts.test: npm run build && echo 'Starting Enhanced F2MoviesDL tests...' && node dist/enhanced-download-test.js
scripts.test:download: npm run build && node dist/enhanced-download-test.js download
scripts.test:streams: npm run build && node dist/enhanced-download-test.js streams
scripts.test:play: npm run build && node dist/enhanced-download-test.js play
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Enhanced F2MoviesDL dependencies installed. Run: npm test'

author: Potat0C0rn3r
